channel.title: OGLplus news
channel.description: The latest news from OGLplus.org site.

item.title: OGLplus.org has an RSS feed!
item.description: Feed for OGLplus-related news about releases, new examples, tutorials, videos or screenshots, downloadable items like textures, models, sounds, fonts, etc.

item.title: OGLplus 0.33.0 released
item.description: New release packages are available for download from SourceForge.

item.title: New textures available
item.description: Two new textures (bricks_color_hmap, stones_color_hmap) are available for download from SF.
